StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetWaiverHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID as integer AS
SELECT CW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID, 'WAIVER_SUBMISSION_DATE' = CONVERT(VARCHAR,CW.WAIVER_SUBMISSION_DATE,106), WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC, WT.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC, WS.WAIVER_STATUS_DESC, WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC, 'WAIVER_CODE' = WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE + WT.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE + WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE FROM CANDIDATE_WAIVER CW, WAIVER_CATEGORY WC, WAIVER_TYPE WT, WAIVER_STATUS WS, WAIVER_LEVEL WL, WAIVER W WHERE CW.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND W.WAIVER_ID = CW.WAIVER_ID AND CW.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = WS.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE AND W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = WC.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = WT.WAIVER_TYPE_ID AND W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = WL.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID
